thread.title: Seth Meyers Calls Out Donald Trump's Silence On The Quebec Shooting
thread.title_full: Seth Meyers Calls Out Donald Trump's Silence On The Quebec Shooting

author: Lee Moran
title: Seth Meyers Calls Out Donald Trump's Silence On The Quebec Shooting
text: Seth Meyers Calls Out Donald Trump's Silence On The Quebec Shooting "Oh, he doesn't tweet about everything?" 02/10/2017 03:38 am ET Lee Moran Trends Editor, The Huffington Post Kellyanne Conway , an adviser to Donald Trump , claimed Tuesday that the president hadn’t commented on the recent Quebec mosque shooting because he “doesn’t tweet about everything.” But “ Late Night ” host Seth Meyers isn’t convinced about her explanation for Trump’s continued silence on the Jan. 29 attack allegedly carried out by white French-Canadian Alexandre Bissonnette , which claimed six lives. “Oh, he doesn’t tweet about everything?” Meyers said on Thursday’s broadcast of the show. “It sure feels like he does!” To prove his point, Meyers then took some time out for a drink as a list of topics Trump has previously tweeted about scrolled on the screen: Check out the full segment above.
